#include<iostream>
#include<string.h>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
	int t;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		char x[10],y[10];
		int sum=0,t,r,i=0,j=0,len1,len2,carry=0;
		cin>>x>>y;
		len1=strlen(x);
		len2=strlen(y);
		while(y[i]&&x[j])
		{
			r=(y[i]-48)+(x[j]-48)+carry;
		//	cout<<r<<"    ";
			i++;
			j++;
			carry=r/10;
			r=r%10;
			sum=sum*10+r;	
		}
		while(y[i])
		{
			r=y[i]-48+carry;
			carry=r/10;
			r=r%10;
			sum=sum*10+r;
			i++;
		}
		while(x[j])
		{
			r=x[j]-48+carry;
			carry=r/10;
			r=r%10;
			sum=sum*10+r;
			j++;	
		}
		
		if(!(y[i]&&x[j])&&carry>0)
			sum=sum*10+carry;
		cout<<sum<<endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
